siminov.core.database

Class Where

  • java.lang.Object
    • siminov.core.database.Where
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAverage, ICount, IDelete, IGroupConcat, IMax, IMin, ISelect, ISum, ITotal

    public class Where
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISelect, IDelete, ICount, ISum, ITotal, IAverage, IMax, IMin, IGroupConcat
    It is used to provide condition between where clause.

      Used to specify GROUP BY statement in conjunction with the aggregate functions to group the result-set by one or more columns.

      Used to specify HAVING clause to SQL because the WHERE keyword could not be used with aggregate functions.
